episodes.title: Ex-Apple Insider: "Working at Apple Felt Like a Cult..." | Joe Weil
episodes.description:
FULL EPISODE: https://youtu.be/PYcy5ZkLvaw

Why would a former Apple insider walk away from one of the most powerful companies on Earth? Joe Weil explains why Apple operates like a cult, how your data is quietly handed over, and why the company’s “privacy” branding isn’t what it seems.

JOE's LINKS:
- UNPLUGGED PHONE: https://unplugged.com/products/up-phone
- IG: https://www.instagram.com/weare_unplugged/

From Apple’s hidden deals to the rise of spyware like Pegasus, Joe reveals how smartphones have become the perfect tool for surveillance—and why even Apple can’t protect you from it.

Inside this episode:

Why Apple is run like a cult from the inside

How your data is shared despite Apple’s “privacy” promise

Why spyware like Pegasus proves Apple can’t stop surveillance

Joe Weil’s unplugged phone solution to fight back

The real cost of convenience in the smartphone era

🔔 Subscribe to Julian Dorey Clips for more explosive conversations with insiders, whistleblowers, and experts exposing the truths big tech doesn’t want you to know.
